Module technology.sola.engine
Package technology.sola.engine.physics.component.particle.appearance

Interface ParticleColorFunction

Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@NullMarked @FunctionalInterface public interface ParticleColorFunction
ParticleColorFunction is a function that returns a Color based on a random value.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final ParticleColorFunction
    WHITE
    A ParticleColorFunction that always returns Color.WHITE.

    Method
    Description
    Color

    Returns a Color based on a random value.

      Color getColor(float roll)
      Returns a Color based on a random value.
